metadata.title: Piaggio P.180 Avanti
aws::graph::propositions: Government Operators of Piaggio P.180 Avanti Aircraft
Bulgaria operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Bulgarian Air Force operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
28th Air Detachment of Bulgaria operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Canada was a former operator of Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Royal Canadian Mounted Police was a former operator of Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Royal Canadian Mounted Police sold their Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft in 2014.
Italy operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Italian Air Force operates 17 Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft since 1994.
Italian Air Force operates 9 P-180 EVO+ aircraft since November 2024.
Italian Army operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Italian Navy operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Carabinieri operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Guardia di Finanza operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Corps of the Port Captaincies – Coast Guard operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Polizia di Stato operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Corpo Forestale dello Stato operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Corpo Nazionale dei Vigili del Fuoco operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Ente Nazionale per l'Assistenza al Volo operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Poland operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Polish Medical Air Rescue (LPR) operates 2 Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Polish Medical Air Rescue (LPR) operates 1 Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Polish Medical Air Rescue (LPR) operates 1 Piaggio P.180 Avanti II aircraft.
Russia operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
Federal State Unitary Enterprise "State ATM Corporation" operates 1 Piaggio P.180 Avanti II aircraft.
United Arab Emirates operates Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
United Arab Emirates Air Force operates 2 Piaggio P.180 Avanti aircraft.
